message.content:
1. The study outcomes included changes in the medication appropriateness index (MAI).
2. The MAI targeted anticholinergic medications.
3. The study outcomes also included changes in the anticholinergic drug scale (ADS) score.
4. The changes in the ADS score were measured from baseline to the end of the study.

messages.content:
Statement: Study outcomes included changes in the medication appropriateness index (MAI) targeting anticholinergic medications and in the anticholinergic drug scale (ADS) score from baseline to the end of study.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
